Meth driver Brydon Boyce drove at 200km/h before crashing into and killing dad of two https://www.nzherald.co.nz/nz/crime/meth-driver-brydon-boyce-drove-at-200kmh-before-crashing-into-and-killing-dad-of-two/7RYXLFKJGBAYXCG4UUQRFAN64Y/ https://www.nzherald.co.nz/nz/crime/meth-driver-brydon-boyce-drove-at-200kmh-before-crashing-into-and-killing-dad-of-two/7RYXLFKJGBAYXCG4UUQRFAN64Y/ Ric StevensDrugs and a loaded pistol were found in Brydon Boyce's unregistered, unwarranted car.
